comments.author: Kelly
comments.content: Great recipe.  I'm going to have to save this.  We tried quite a few mostardas in a cheese course I took last spring, but I had no idea you could make them without mustard oil, which from my understanding is illegal and impossible to find in the states.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Thanks Kelly! Try an Indian grocery if you want to find mustard oil... I used to buy it a lot.
